\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 65877}

\subsection*{For Life}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Be}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 110 mg &  & Methadone & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 240.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have taken opaites for 28 years every day, SMACK, OXYCOT. 40mgs up to 8 a day, HYDROCODONE pills up to 20 a day. I do not know how my liver survied all the Tylenol TRIED 4 TREATMENT PROGRAMS with no luck. Then 5 years ago I Started the METHADONE program  In short, it has saved my life.
